name: Balancer Aave Boosted StablePool (USD)
description: This token represents a Balancer liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool and can also deposit the LP token to Balancer's gauges to earn BAL emissions. This Balancer Boosted Pool is a nested pool comprised of 3 Linear Pools: bb-a-DAI (DAI & aDAI), bb-a-USDC (USDC & aUSDC), bb-a-USDT (USDT & aUSDT).
